text:
="preserve">Sunflower is a town in Sunflower County, Mississippi. The population was 696 at the 2000 census.
As of the census of 2000, there were 696 people, 229 households, and 166 families residing in the town. The median income for a household in the town was $21,842, and the median income for a family was $23,750.
Musicians Matt Murphy and Jerry Butler were born here.
